original_text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.
korean_text: 이 향유를 삼백 데나리온 이상에 팔아 가난한 자들에게 줄 수 있었겠도다 하며 그 여자를 책망하는지라

sentences.original_text: For it might have been sold
for more than three hundred pence,
and have been given to the poor.
